content.question: Which of the following characterizes a behavioral approach to psychology?

choices.label: A study of the unconscious motives involved in behavior
An introspective study of the mental imagery used in problem solving
The use of a projective test to assess personality
A study of how reinforcement affects learning

content.answer: A study of how reinforcement affects learning

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
